    • Method Detail

      • getDatabaseContext

        public Optional<StandaloneDatabaseContext> getDatabaseContext​(NamedDatabaseId namedDatabaseId)
        Description copied from interface: DatabaseManager
        Returns a given DatabaseContext object by identifier, or `Optional.empty()` if the database does not exist
        Parameters:
        namedDatabaseId - the ID of the database to be returned
        Returns:
        optionally, the database context instance with ID databaseId

      • initialiseSystemDatabase

        public void initialiseSystemDatabase()
        Description copied from interface: DatabaseManager
        Creates the system database. This must be created and started before any other databases can be created. If the system database is already initialised, nothing happens

      • initialiseDefaultDatabase

        public void initialiseDefaultDatabase()
        Description copied from interface: DatabaseManager
        Creates those databases which are required by default in a Neo4j install as per the system Config. If default databases are already initialised, nothing happens

      • createDatabase

        public StandaloneDatabaseContext createDatabase​(NamedDatabaseId namedDatabaseId)
        Create database with specified name. Database name should be unique. By default a database is in a started state when it is initially created.
        Parameters:
        namedDatabaseId - ID of database to create
        Returns:
        database context for newly created database
        Throws:
        DatabaseExistsException - In case if database with specified name already exists

      • createDatabaseContext

        protected StandaloneDatabaseContext createDatabaseContext​(NamedDatabaseId namedDatabaseId)
        Specified by:
        createDatabaseContext in class AbstractDatabaseManager<StandaloneDatabaseContext>

      • dropDatabase

        public void dropDatabase​(NamedDatabaseId ignore)
        Description copied from interface: DatabaseManager
        Drop database with specified name. Database that was requested to be dropped will be stopped first, and then completely removed. If database with requested name does not exist exception will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        ignore - ID of database to drop.

      • upgradeDatabase

        public void upgradeDatabase​(NamedDatabaseId namedDatabaseId)
                     throws DatabaseNotFoundException
        Description copied from interface: DatabaseManager
        Upgrade database with specified name. The database will be restarted if it is running.
        Parameters:
        namedDatabaseId - ID of database to upgrade.
        Throws:
        DatabaseNotFoundException - if there is no database by the given name.

      • stopDatabase

        public void stopDatabase​(NamedDatabaseId ignore)
        Description copied from interface: DatabaseManager
        Stop database with specified name. Stopping already stopped database does not have any effect.
        Parameters:
        ignore - database ID to stop

      • startDatabase

        public void startDatabase​(NamedDatabaseId namedDatabaseId)
        Description copied from interface: DatabaseManager
        Start database with specified name. Starting already started database does not have any effect.
        Parameters:
        namedDatabaseId - database ID to start

      • stopDatabase

        protected void stopDatabase​(NamedDatabaseId namedDatabaseId,
                            StandaloneDatabaseContext context)
        Overrides:
